title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: Park Home
body: A Poet of the People  Carl Sandburg provided a popular voice for the American people of the twentieth century and still speaks to us through his words, songs and the beauty and serenity of Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site.Explore Sandburg's legacy and Experience Your America!                Plan Your Visit   Any season is a great time to visit the Sandburg Home        Preservation Work   The interior of the Sandburg Home has been prepared for preservation work.  Take a house tour and see what's being done.        Special Events   A young visitor enjoys a hands-on demonstration during a special event.              Poetry Contest   Ribbons and poems are displayed for student recognition.        Writer in Residence   Learn more about becoming a Sandburg Writer-in-Residence        Poetry of Carl Sandburg   Read selections of Sandburg's award-winning poetry.
